name: Steam Spell
text: You’ve built off of some of the closely-guarded secrets of the undine steamcasters, allowing you to use fire magic underwater easily.
benefit: You can apply Steam Spell only to a spell with the fire descriptor. A steam spell works underwater without a caster level check, but it requires a caster level check to function above water. A steam spell uses up a slot the same spell level as the spell’s actual level.
text_zh: 你成功研究出了一些水元素裔蒸汽术者（steamcaster）们所牢牢保护的秘密，这让你能够轻易地在水下使用火焰魔法。
benefit_zh: 你只能将蒸汽法术应用到拥有火焰描述符的法术上。在水下使用蒸汽法术不需要施法者等级检定，但在水上则需要一个施法者等级检定才能生效。火焰法术不会占用比法术的实际环级高的法术位。
